channel.title: [Solved] Run Server Error in Item.cfg after adding items
channel.description: I have gotten this error before and 'rich told me not to use spaces to i went back deleted it all and completely redid it and i compiled got no errors and then i ran the server and got this message [code]online! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 16 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:111)[/code] I really dont understand these error message at all and i really need to fix it [code]// NEW ITEMS // ----SKILL CAPES---- item = 4315 Attack_Cape Its a Attack_Cape 99000 99000 99000 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 item = 4316 Attack_Cape(t) Its a Attack_Cape(t) 99000 99000 99000 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 9 item = 4318 Strength_Cape Its a Strenght_Cape 99000 99000 99000 9 9 9 9 9 9 item.title: [Solved] Run Server Error in Item.cfg after adding items
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

I figured it our there needs to be 16 numbers in each lines

Read full topic
item.source: [Solved] Run Server Error in Item.cfg after adding items

item.title: [Solved] Run Server Error in Item.cfg after adding items
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

It looks like you forgot prices. See where you have just one or 2 900000â€™s? You need to have three.

EDIT: Make sure each line has 15 numbers.

Read full topic
item.source: [Solved] Run Server Error in Item.cfg after adding items
